text: The 2016–17 season of the Cypriot Futsal First Division is the 18th season of top-tier futsal in Cyprus. The regular season started on September 22, 2016, and concluded in April 2017. The championship playoffs will follow the end of the regular season. APOEL was the defending champions, winning its third title overall and in a row. ==Stadia and Locations== ==Regular season== ===Standings=== ===Results=== ==Playoffs== ===Bracket=== ===Quarter-finals=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=200|Team 1 !width=80| !width=200|Team 2 !width=80|Game 1 !width=80|Game 2 !width=80|Game 3 |- | align=right|AEL Limassol||2–0|| align=left|Elpida Astromeriti||8–1||10–2||bgcolor=#C0C0C0| |- | align=right|Omonia-Ararat||2–1|| align=left|AEK Larnaca||0–3||3–2||6–0 |- | align=right|Anorthosis||2–0|| align=left|AMEK Kapsalou||7–0||10–2||bgcolor=#C0C0C0| |- | align=right|APOEL||2–0|| align=left|AEK Sotira||6–1||9–3||bgcolor=#C0C0C0| |- |} ====Game 1==== ====Game 2==== ====Game 3==== ===Semi-finals=== {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=200|Team 1 !width=80| !width=200|Team 2 !width=80|Game 1 !width=80|Game 2 !width=80|Game 3 |- | align=right|AEL Limassol||1–2|| align=left|Omonia-Ararat||3–2||3–8||5–6 |- | align=right|Anorthosis||0–1|| align=left|APOEL||1–3||3–1||– |- |} ====Game 1==== ====Game 2==== ====Game 3==== ==See also== * 2016–17 Cypriot Futsal Cup ==References== Category:Futsal competitions in Cyprus
